mapper.select: SELECT H.SEQ_H seq_h, M.ID id, M.NAME name, M.PHONE phone FROM HOST H , MEMBER M WHERE M.SEQ_M = H.SEQ_M AND H.STATE ='Y'
SELECT H.SEQ_H seq_h, M.SEQ_M seq_m, R.ROOM_NAME room_name, H.STATE state FROM MEMBER M, HOST H, ROOM R WHERE M.SEQ_M = H.SEQ_M AND H.STATE='N'AND R.SEQ_H = H.SEQ_H
SELECT * FROM REQUIREMENTS ORDER BY SEQ_RQ DESC
